Posts.Content: i am a 5 year breast cancer survivor as of February of this year, the oncologist felt that it was time for me to go off the Arimidex, I was reluctant at first but I did, now I am experiencing not hot flashes but cold sweats does this sound normal, back in 2007 I had a complete hysterectomy but went straight through menopause.
Posts.Title: Anyone experiencing any sweats after going off Arimidex
